description: In this class we continue exploring Islam. In this course we will turn from discussing its history to exploring its core beliefs. We will be discussing the six articles of faith and the five pillars of Islam. We will delve deep into why these beliefs exist and how it affects the people who practice these beliefs. We will also be looking at how these beliefs compare to the beliefs of Christianity. by the end of this course you will be better equipped to know which one is more likely the truth and be able to better articulate why you believe what you believe.
title: 206  -  Islam and the Bible
